Clothespins can be used as bookmarks for keeping your place in a book or journal.
Clothespins can be used as a simple and eco-friendly alternative to plastic clips for organizing cables and wires.
A clothespin can be used as a plant marker to label plants in a garden or greenhouse.
Clothespins can be used as a creative way to hold up paper or lightweight fabric in place.
A clothespin can be used as a small bird feeder by attaching birdseed to it and hanging it in a tree.
